name: Cargill Personal Care - L22™ Skin Lipid Mimetic
description: Cargill Personal Care offers L22™, a skin lipid mimetic that supports the skin's natural barrier function while improving firmness and elasticity. This biomimetic technology replicates the lipid composition found in healthy skin, providing comprehensive barrier repair benefits. Cargill's sustainable sourcing and natural ingredient focus makes L22™ ideal for clean beauty formulations.

contact.address: 15407 McGinty Road West, Wayzata, MN 55391, USA

notes: Major agricultural and food ingredients company with strong personal care division. L22™ is a unique skin lipid mimetic that supports barrier function and improves skin firmness. Sustainable sourcing and natural focus align with clean beauty trends.
